offer.title: FREE Pack
offer.details: Get 1 FREE pack of any style Winston when you bring in 5 empty New Winston packs of the same style.

conditions.location: Good at any USA Gasoline or USA Mini Mart store in California.
conditions.limit: Limit one free pack per customer per day.
conditions.exclusions: Not good with any other offer.

warning.message: Smoking Causes Lung Cancer, Heart Disease, Emphysema, And May Complicate Pregnancy.
